changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW person_management.person_summary_view AS SELECT id_person, version, first_name, last_name, pesel, height, weight, email, gender, type FROM person_management.persons

changeSet.author: your_name
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW person_management.employee_summary_view AS SELECT ps.id_person, ps.version, ps.first_name, ps.last_name, ps.pesel, ps.height, ps.weight, ps.email, ps.gender, ps.type, COUNT(DISTINCT pv.job_name) AS profession_count, COUNT(pv.id_position) AS position_count, pv.salary AS current_salary, pv.job_name AS current_position, pv.start_date, pv.end_date FROM person_management.person_summary_view ps JOIN person_management.employees e ON ps.id_person = e.id_person LEFT JOIN person_management.positions_view pv ON e.id_person = pv.employee_id GROUP BY ps.id_person, ps.version, ps.first_name, ps.last_name, ps.pesel, ps.height, ps.weight, ps.email, ps.gender, ps.type, pv.salary, pv.job_name, pv.start_date, pv.end_date
